item.title: Introducing ScenarioTests, an experiment in improving the .NET testing experience
item.author: koen@linker.io (Koen)
item.description: When developing software, you’ll sooner or later be confronted with the notion of Tests. In the .NET landscape we have plenty of tools at our disposal to help us test our code. In this post I’d like to introduce ScenarioTests. A new project that aims to make testing in .NET better.
